subject: Data-driven testing
msgSnippet: Hi all I am a JUNit newbie - does anyone perhaps know if what the de-facto standard approach is to data-driven JUnit testing (if something like that exists).
messageBody:
Hi all

I am a JUNit newbie - does anyone perhaps know if what the de-facto
standard approach is to data-driven JUnit testing (if something like
that exists).

Is it even relevant as far as unit testing is concerned?

Regards
Herman
